name: Wax-Boy
description:
Short Halloween themed spooky game with multiple endings.

* * *

Our main character had a rough day and was heading home when he had a little accident. All by himself, out in the middle of nowhere, surrounded by the darkest, densest woods he had ever seen. 

It's a good thing he had the absolutely amazing 100k lumen flashlight. Though, will he be able to escape this situation? There are numerous paths to success, and even more ways to a painful death!

* * *

Tips - Use "T" when you reach teleportation goal. Initially, it is a good strategy to save travel time, but it will reset when you begin a new game.

Wax-Boy is incredibly sneaky and quick, but fortunately, he hates bright lights. If you flash your super awesome flashlight directly in his face, it should calm him down for a while. Always pay attention, and you might even want to switch off your lights so your eyes can get used to the darkness.

Small celebratory item in the main menu becomes available once all endings have been reached! Have Fun!

* * *

Wax-Boy's model design and original idea goes to Dr.Galaxie
